ygData.subject: Opal responce
ygData.msgSnippet: Somehow my email program burped and I lost your reply Countess..... Anyway, I can t remember what I have already sent, so I will just pick a start point. The
ygData.messageBody:
Somehow my email program burped and I lost your reply
Countess.....
Anyway, I can't remember what I have already sent, so I
will just pick a start point.
The last time I was in Freeport surface world was over 3
weeks ago. Last time I was in the Slums of the surface
was 2 months ago.
I was talking to my wife about this and when you brought
up the 2 Opals I may have blurred 2 different topics
together.
In the Slums of East Freeport, behind the leather
shop/town wall, (I think I said West last time, sorry)
my wife said there is a Dark Elf Opal Darkbriar behind
one of the buildings, though she is not sure which one.

Could you repost the Opals that you know the locations
of? ie the HE Enchanter in Arcane Science is a
definate. Now I am fuzzy on where you said the other
Opal is. I don't have the thread that lead up to this,
and can't remember if you said the 2nd Opal was a Human
in the sewers by the other guild leaders, or if it was
the DE on the surface in the Slums of East Feerport.
There may be no 3rd Opal. :)
The objet in the room I was thinking of happened at the
same time that my wife and I noticed 2 differant Opals
and I may have put them together by association. The
object was an incomplete vent pipe and steam in the
upper floor of the forge house (I think Groflah's
Forge?) that was in the slum area of East Freeport.

I am very sorry for any wasted time you spent on my
earlier post. I hate Freeport anyway since my PC always
locks up when I enter it. West Freeport is the worst
because of the Arcane science building, followed by East
Freeport because of the boat. North Freeport never
locks me up. The Bank in Neriak slows me down because
of the magic guild next to it and all the spells going
off.
This leads me to a new thread, coming soon to your
mailbox. :)

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
13th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
